course_title: Human Anatomy and Physiology I with Lab
class_notes: All nursing pre-reqs courses require department permission to enroll. For Emory SON permission you must email nursingregistrar@emory.edu for registration approval and support.
course_description: This course is an introduction to the structure and function of the human body. Topics covered include cell structure, function and biochemistry; characteristics of tissues; control systems and homeostasis; and skeletal, muscle, and nervous system function. Laboratory experiences.
